mainBoard.name: Dauthi Slayer

rulings.text: Once a creature has been blocked, that creature remains blocked and will deal and be dealt combat damage even if it gains or loses shadow or if the blocking creature gains or loses shadow.
If an attacking creature has multiple evasion abilities, such as shadow and flying, a creature can block it only if that creature satisfies all of the appropriate evasion abilities.
Multiple instances of shadow on the same creature are redundant.

mainBoard.text:

Fliegend

1, entferne eine +1/+1 Marke von dem Thopter-Geschwader: Bringe einen Thopter- Spielstein ins Spiel. Behandle diesen Spielstein wie eine fliegende 1/1 Artefaktkreatur. Spiele diese Fähigkeit wie eine Hexerei.
1, opfere einen Thopter: Lege eine +1/+1 Marke auf das Thopter- Geschwader. Spiele diese Fähigkeit wie eine Hexerei.

mainBoard.name: Thopter Squadron
mainBoard.text:
Flying
Thopter Squadron enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.
{1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Thopter Squadron: Create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. Activate only as a sorcery.
{1}, Sacrifice another Thopter: Put a +1/+1 counter on Thopter Squadron. Activate only as a sorcery.
